name: Second Chance Youth Program
description: Second Chance is committed to empowering youth with the self-awareness, skills and resources necessary to transition from in-risk behaviors, involvement in violence and other barriers, encouraging them towards safe and healthy lifestyles. Second chance offers comprehensive services and enrichment activities to youth ages 13-25 years of age Services offered: - Tattoo Removal Clinic - Case Management - Mental Health Services - Peer Support Groups - Arts Education - Raices (Roots) - Summer Field Tr

howToGetIt: Eligible for people between ages 13-25 years. You can call the office to inquire about any of the programs.
address: 3101 Mission Street, Suite 101,  San Francisco, CA, 94110
